content.question: Imagine that you are making an oral presentation to your Japanese class. First, you will read and hear the topic for your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as full as possible.Prompt 1

frqParts.text: Imagine that you are making an oral presentation to your Japanese class. First, you will read and hear the topic for your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as full as possible.Prompt 1

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
